amendatorysection.catchline: Regional network, school, or center; remittance of money.
amendatorysection.para: All money derived from any source other than General Fund appropriations by any regional network, school, or center as provided in sections 79-1148 and 79-1149 shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the State Department of Education Cash Fund, and such money shall be made available to any such regional network, school, or center for purposes of education, training, or maintenance of students.
